name: Suki's Spooky Romance
description: Four catgirls, a crazy haunted mansion, monsters, and forbidden love. Grab a bottle of Mojo. You're going to need it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 1.06 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 800 MB available space
